title: @ohos.ability.featureAbility (FeatureAbility模块)
summary: Ability Kit Ability 模块的 @ohos.ability.featureAbility (FeatureAbility模块)，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: 使用限制
sections.summary: FeatureAbility模块的接口只能在Page类型的Ability中调用。
